sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
General Assembly Appointing Authority Act.

sections.heading: In all cases in which any statute constitutes a group of members of the
sections.text:
General Assembly as an appointing authority for the purpose of making
appointments to the governing body of a unit of local government, the
member of such appointing authority with the greatest seniority as a member
of the General Assembly shall be responsible for organization of the
appointing authority. In case of a tie, seniority shall be determined by
lot.

sections.heading: All agencies of this State are directed to furnish necessary services
sections.text:
and facilities required by such appointing authorities. Records of
appointing authorities shall be deposited with the Secretary of State.
